document_data.name: Lowhill
document_data.caption: A map showing Lowhill near Corwell.
document_data.mainbody: '''Lowhill''' was a small [[halfling]] town a mile outside of [[Caer Corwell]] on the isle of [[Gwynneth]].
document_data.Inhabitants: A notable halfling from the community was [[Pawldo]], a talented archer and swordsman who traveled with [[Tristan Kendrick]] and who also sold him the [[moorhound]] [[Canthus]].
